title: Translate an Emotion Chain to a Solvable Expression
objectives: Map emotion sequence to function over time
Anchor your reasoning in time (Temporal Anchor Rule)
prompt: Given a peer's message `😢→🤔→🌱→😊`, write a response that echoes the mood, anchors it in time, and proposes a growth function. Use our symbols where helpful.
examples: 🌧️ seen → ⏳ it was heavy → 🧩🌀 let's map how it eased → 🌬️🪞 tell me if this fits
😢🔆 acknowledged → f(t)=d(e)/dt→ 🌱 when t>now → 🚀 goal: 😊 equilibrium
